page.title: 11Our Estate
page.content: The housing estate where I live is called Le Squez Estate. The building of the estate has changed the landscape dramatically. When you look around there are not as many trees as there used to be. There were about five or six fields because before the estate was built it used to be a farm. Each field had a row of trees surrounding it. The trees were meant as a wind break so a double row of trees was needed. All this has gone now but there are still a few trees round this estate. Hopefully there will be some new trees planted and we shall have some more greenery around the estate. So the estate was built on top of a farm.
